mock_mode_disclaimer: Available only in MOCK test environment.
server_credentials_hint: Use your institutional credentials to sign in.
default_error: Invalid credentials. Verify your email and password.
register_description: Register to access the reservation system
password_requirement: Password must be at least 8 characters
all_fields_required: All required fields must be completed
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address to receive a recovery link
recovery_email_sent_desc: We have sent a recovery link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
recovery_email_not_received: If you don't receive the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder or try again.
help_recovery_expiry: The recovery link expires in 1 hour
help_recovery_limit: You can only request a link every 5 minutes
help_contact_support: If you have issues, contact technical support
new_password_hint: Use at least 8 characters with a mix of letters and numbers
reset_success_desc: Your password has been changed successfully. You will be redirected to login...
no_token_warning: No valid token found. Please request a new recovery link.
security_tip_unique: Use a unique password that you don't use on other sites
security_tip_mix: Combine uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers
security_tip_share: Do not share your password with anyone
error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
error_processing_request: Error processing request. Please try again.
error_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
error_reset_failed: Error resetting password. The token might be expired.
error_reset_processing: Error processing request. Please try again or request a new link.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
